h1_title: Chapter 1 Secret - Ancient Guanyin Temple Walkthrough
h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Elder Jinchi
content: The big twist on this fight that you’ll notice immediately is all the wandering bronze-colored corpses milling about the arena. The good news is they actually aren’t a threat — at least at first. This means you can focus on attacking the boss without worrying about one of them randomly clawing at you, but there’s more to it than that.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_1_Secret-Ancient_Guanyin_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 1 Secret - Ancient Guanyin Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Elder Jinchi'.
The content is as follows:
The big twist on this fight that you’ll notice immediately is all the wandering bronze-colored corpses milling about the arena. The good news is they actually aren’t a threat — at least at first. This means you can focus on attacking the boss without worrying about one of them randomly clawing at you, but there’s more to it than that.
